byMnemonicAlreadyWritten: I Wrote Down My Mnemonic Phrase
byJsonFileDontLoseDesc: Be careful, it can not be recovered if you lose it.
byJsonFileDontShareDesc: Если вы используете этот файл на фишинговом сайте, то ваши деньги украдут.
byJsonFileMakeBackupDesc: Храните его как миллион долларов (однажды он, возможно, будет столько стоить).
pageFooterTitle: Want to learn more about Blockchain or MEW? Please go to
mewConnectDesc: Safe and easy to access my wallet in 3 steps.
tutorialModalDesc: Please take a moment to read through this short introduction. It's extremely important to pay attention to what we have to say, for your own security. Ignoring this step will highly increase your chances of getting phished.
notARecommendedWay: This is NOT a recommended way of creating a wallet. This information is sensitive, and these options should only be used in offline settings by experienced crypto users.
